caller_intent: The caller (representing Lakeview Loan Servicing LLC) is seeking assistance with a non-renewal of a Hazardous Homeowners Policy due to NGM Insurance no longer operating in North Carolina. They need confirmation of the non-renewal reason, verification of policy details, and guidance on transitioning to Main Street America Insurance Company.
resolution_steps: Agent Brandy verified the caller's identity using the policy number and initial.
Confirmed the policy's non-renewal effective date (10/1/2025) and reason (NGM Insurance exiting North Carolina).
Checked if Lakeview Loan Servicing LLC is listed as the first lien holder on the policy.
Notified the caller that the policy number remains the same with Main Street America Insurance Company until 10/1/2025.
Provided the website (www.mycoverageinfo.com/agent) for uploading the declaration page using a loan number, zip code, and insured last name.
Clarified that no cancellation documents exist for non-renewals and that a new policy is not yet generated.
knowledge_required: Understanding of insurance policy non-renewal processes and reasons (e.g., carrier exit from a state).
Ability to verify policy details (lien holders, effective dates) via internal systems.
Knowledge of transitioning policies between insurers and associated documentation requirements.
systems_referenced: Internal policy database (to verify policy details and lien holders).
summary: Brandy assisted Lakeview Loan Servicing LLC with a non-renewal of a Hazardous Homeowners Policy due to NGM Insurance's exit from North Carolina. The agent confirmed the non-renewal details, verified the policy's transition to Main Street America Insurance Company, and directed the caller to a website for future documentation. The call concluded with the caller expressing gratitude and no further questions.
